name: BYE BYE Bullseye
description:
DON’T SAY BYE YET!

Statistically, more than 7.53 Million people know what a Bow and Arrow are. Additionally, it’s been recorded nearly back 64,000 Thousand of years ago.

Yet we just Reinvented the medieval era practice of hitting the bullseye. However, the Centre of a shooting target is called notably a Bulls-eye.

Given these points, Are you a master Archer? May you be able to achieve hitting a target let alone it’s only you got ONE Shot.

Lastly leaving this game in a serious race to the top of the leaderboards. May you achieve the global ranks as the best Archer in the world?

BYE! I Mean HELLO!, I mean THIS IS Bye Bye Bullseye is a game where you fling an arrow with a touch on the screen and try to hit and amazingly challenging target! The more friends you challenge the more exciting it gets!

Click the play button and try to click the screen when the arrow lines up with the target. Launching an arrow FUROUSILY, hitting a target (Making you smile) additionally will collect a coin for your own collection. However, you may even spend the coins to get the latest arrow you can afford!

I challenge anyone to dare to unlock them all!

This app has a Record SUMMER SALE - .99 CENTS (No Ads) WHICH NOTABLY was Valued to be set at 2.99 - SUMMER SALE WILL BE GONE BEFORE YOU KNOW IT!

QUICK GUIDE TO PLAY

Hit Bullseye = 1 coin ( Additionally 1 Point also)

HIT Lightening = Game OVER

MISS = Game OVER

App Symbols Quick Guide -

Question Mark ? = Guide

House = Home

Shopping Cart = Store (Purchasing a variety of arrows to shoot at the bullseye)

Crescent Wrench crossing Screwdriver = Settings

Trophy = LeaderBoard

Star = Review

Three dots among 2 lines connecting = Share

Music symbol = Music off or on depending on if the line is slashed through it.

NO ads = Purchase of App through Apple

Diamond = Restore Purchase

I WISH YOU THE BEST OF LUCK THANK YOU!

The next update will include launching extra worlds, among this will be a variety of items to choose to launch off to hit the target. Additionally, Power-ups will also be included in future updates..! Very exciting.
